channel.title: Comments on: Watch: Roj Niyogi Answers Community Questions

item.title: By: Praveen
item.dc:creator: Praveen
item.description:
Good to hear the news. I hope this transition gets Corona the success it really deserves!
Roj, I hope there is more android and internationalization support that is added into the platform soon!!!
Happy Holidays to All!!!
item.content:encoded:
Good to hear the news. I hope this transition gets Corona the success it really deserves!

Roj, I hope there is more android and internationalization support that is added into the platform soon!!!

Happy Holidays to All!!!

item.title: By: Jorge González
item.dc:creator: Jorge González
item.description:
Reborn my hope to see resolved the most voted requests and ignored by CoronaLabs so far; Widgets to replace native textBox and textField and Linux platform support for developers.
Please help us!
Garrapato
item.content:encoded:
Reborn my hope to see resolved the most voted requests and ignored by CoronaLabs so far; Widgets to replace native textBox and textField and Linux platform support for developers.

Please help us!

Garrapato

item.title: By: Simon Fearby
item.dc:creator: Simon Fearby
item.description:
I have no problems with the Perk takeover, as Roj says there needs to be a value proposition and he demonstrated the value in Corona.
I have no idea what Fuse's value proposition was?
I really hope Perk updates the Corona webpage as it has not changed in years and looks stale.
I would prefer a cheaper enterprise licence as I have dropped back to the free tier and I fee like a leech (but I don't have any active games anymore in the app stores as this is a hobby for me).
item.content:encoded:
I have no problems with the Perk takeover, as Roj says there needs to be a value proposition and he demonstrated the value in Corona.

I have no idea what Fuse’s value proposition was?

I really hope Perk updates the Corona webpage as it has not changed in years and looks stale.

I would prefer a cheaper enterprise licence as I have dropped back to the free tier and I fee like a leech (but I don’t have any active games anymore in the app stores as this is a hobby for me).

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description:
Great talk many things to learn. yeah Corona has big potential, and it's a big opportunity right there, I hope Corona got to the right hands, But...
The BIG question, will there be Conflict of interest? will Perk has internal Corona and public Corona versions?
I hope it will be just the opposite, where Perk already share some of the Corona plugins/addons they already have!
Roj, Can you please answer this?
Thank you, and Good luck for you, for Corona and for Corona community
item.content:encoded:
Great talk many things to learn.
yeah Corona has big potential, and it’s a big opportunity right there,
I hope Corona got to the right hands, But…

The BIG question, will there be Conflict of interest? will Perk has internal Corona and public Corona versions?

I hope it will be just the opposite, where Perk already share some of the Corona plugins/addons they already have!

Roj, Can you please answer this?

Thank you,
and Good luck for you, for Corona and for Corona community
